biotools.summary: Genome-based transcript reconstruction and quantification from RNA-seq reads. Its algorithmic core not only reconstructs transcripts ab initio, but also allows the use of the growing annotation of known splice sites, transcription start and end sites, or full-length transcripts, which are available for most model organisms

bioschemas.name: Cidane
